##**_It's time for DFGaren to rise again lads._**

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/3m-2LdW_S2M/maxresdefault.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Dusteon,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=zboE4mHO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-19T01:34:57.132+0000)
>
> For quick reference, Abyssal changes Garen's ult damage to 192.5/385/577.5 (+31.46% / 36.63% / 44% missing health).

While Garen's original ult damage is 175 / 350 / 525 (+ 28.6 / 33.3 / 40% of target's missing health)

So with a fully ranked up ult, your pumping out an additional 52.5 (+4% missing health) damage, that can make quite the difference!
